}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Also distributed as "Experia WiFi" by Dutch ISP '''KPN''' :with part-number FZE994202000J.
Some versions have a [[Winbond]] W250256JVFQ flash :and [[Winbond]] W631GG6MB12J DDR3 SDRAM.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/arcadyan/astoria/arcadyan_astoria_wg420223-99 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/inbox/toh/arcadyan/astoria/we420223-99 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/adding-openwrt-support-for-arcadyan-we420223-99-kpn-experia-wifi/132653 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- auto --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
